data.description:
👋Welcome to the free prologue of the best-selling Meta Quest 2 game - Thief Simulator VR: Greenview Street. Discover the story of a small-time burglar's escape from prison 🏛️ and step into his shoes while working for the Lombardi family on the outside. When you are done escaping prison - check out the full version of the game and continue the story on Greenview Street🛣️

Full version of the game available on Meta Store!
✊Grab Everything Bundle and get the ultimate thieving experience! 
📢 60+ missions on 7 maps! 
🎲 17 mini-games (e.g. lockpicking, safe cracking, car stealing & disassembly, hacking, climbing, alarms disabling + more)
🚗 7 cars to hijack and disassembly
📦54 skins (crowbars, gloves, tablets, watches, bagpacks, flashlights)!

The set includes:
- Thief Simulator VR: Greenview Street✅
- Thief Simulator VR: Richie R. Street✅
- Thief Simulator VR: The Motel DLC✅
- All Skin Packs with 54 items!✅

🔸 Become a stealthy contractor in the sandbox open-world city.
🔹 Outsmart the NPCs by hiding, sneaking, climbing, stealing & hacking.
🔸 Escape the police with realistic car driving, paint jobs & car customization.
🔹Throw, smash & manipulate hundreds of objects.
🔸 Expand your arsenal of tools, gadgets & upgrades.
🔹 Observe your targets to avoid danger.
🔸 Character progression based on levels, skills system & RPG elements.
🔹 VR experience for both casual & hardcore players, seeking a true challenge with marvelous replayability.
